import React from 'react' import "./Cart.scss" import DeleteOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/DeleteOutlined"; const Cart =()=>{ const data = [ { id:1, img:"https://images.pexels.com/photos/2065200/pexels-photo-2065200.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=1600", title: "Hat", desc: "Hat", isNew:true, oldPrice:19, price:12, }, { id:2, img:"https://images.pexels.com/photos/1457983/pexels-photo-1457983.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=1600", title: "Coat", desc: "Coat", isNew:true, oldPrice:19, price:12, }, ] return(

Products in your cart

{data?.map((item)=>(

{item.title}

{item.desc?.substring(0.100)}

1 x ${item.price}
))}
SUBTOTAL $123
Reset Cart
) } export default Cart
